sentence.Network_cn: 他居然中了5000英镑的奖券.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: probably from Dutch loterij, from lot 'lot'

entry.tran: （通过发行彩票方式的）抽彩给奖法，博彩
entry.def: A lottery is a type of gambling game in which people buy numbered tickets. Several numbers are then chosen, and the people who have those numbers on their tickets win a prize.

entry.tran: 听天由命的事；全凭运气的事
entry.def: If you describe something as a lottery, you mean that what happens depends entirely on luck or chance.

example.ex: Which judges are assigned to a case is always a bit of a lottery.
example.tran: 一个案子安排哪些法官来审理，往往有点看运气。

means.word_mean: 1. something that is regarded as a chance event;

sentences.sentence: "the election was just a lottery to them"

means.word_mean: 2. players buy (or are given) chances and prizes are distributed according to the drawing of lots

auth_sentence.content: This lottery grant is the icing on the cake.
auth_sentence.res_content: This lottery grant is the icing on the cake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This lottery grant is the icing on the cake.

auth_sentence.content: But the odds are far worse than any lottery.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the odds are far worse than any lottery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the odds are far worse than any lottery.

auth_sentence.content: But he copied it down as a lottery number.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he copied it down as a lottery number.

sentences.en: He bought lottery tickets from handicapped people.
sentences.cn: 他从残疾人手中买奖券。

sentences.en: She won a fortune in a lottery.
sentences.cn: 她在一次抽奖中赢了一笔大钱。

means.word_mean: 碰运气的事, 难于算计的事

sentences.en: They thought themselves lucky in the lottery of life.
sentences.cn: 他们认为自己是变幻莫测的人生中的幸运者。

sentences.en: Lottery is also a form of gambling.
sentences.cn: 彩票也是赌博的一种形式。

jushi.english: Her heart jumped as she heard the news that one of her lottery tickets had won a great prize.
jushi.chinese: 听到她的一张彩票中了大奖的消息，她的心咚咚直跳。

jushi.english: She won a fortune in a lottery.
jushi.chinese: 她在抽奖中赢得了一大笔钱。

jushi.english: Education in England is something of a lottery.
jushi.chinese: 在英国接受教育是件碰运气的事情。
